persona.title: Professionals Evaluating Solutions
persona.description: This group comprises individuals or teams in professional roles who are actively researching or considering solutions relevant to their work or organization. They are likely seeking information that is practical, relevant, and helps them understand the value proposition and feasibility of a solution within their specific context and decision-making process. Clarity and directness are highly valued.

situation.title: Presenting a Solution or Offering
situation.description: The user is communicating to introduce or elaborate on a specific product, service, or offering designed to address a need or provide value. The context is informative, aiming to highlight benefits and encourage further exploration or action.
